critique: The document amends Executive Order No. 11490 to reflect changes in energy administration, specifically addressing emergency preparedness and the roles of the Energy Research and Development Administration (ERDA) and the Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC). It outlines procedures for these agencies during national emergencies, including nuclear attacks, focusing on health and safety, nuclear materials security, production, and information dissemination. The document centralizes authority in the federal government to manage energy-related emergencies and maintain national security.
